DOC.brief_summary: This study determine incidence severity dry eye patient undergoing cataract surgery determine grade International Task Force ( ITF ) scale .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Health Assessment Cataract Patients ' Ocular Surface
DOC.criteria: Patients least 55 year old . Patients must schedule undergo cataract surgery . No previous intraocular surgery previous 3 month either eye . No previous Corneal laser vision correction either eye within last one year . No previous lid surgery within past 3 month . Patients may use topical antibiotic , topical NSAIDs topical steroid either eye past month . Patients eligible recently start Restasis solely perioperative treatment regimen . Patients presently use Restasis either eye undergo study test questionnaire complete patient regard use medication .
